Header.title: Hi, my name is
Header.body: Dallas based web developer & designer who builds responsive, user-centric, and intuitive user interfaces for the web.

About.summary: I am passionate and an avid learner of all things technology and design. I graduated from The University of Texas at Dallas with a Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology and Systems. I’m self-taught HTML, CSS, and Javascript, and I spent my free time designing web pages throughout college. I entered the web development space these past three years, and throughout the process, I learned many technologies like PHP, Bootstrap, React, and Serverless through AWS. I am truly passionate about building something from the ground up and continue to work on side projects to gain more experience and skills.

Projects.name: Wedding RSVP
Projects.topic: A wedding invite and RSVP app
Projects.description: A wedding invitation and RSVP tracking web app built with React, Firebase, and Chakra UI
Projects.about: Driven by the anticipation of my approaching wedding, I undertook the development of an intuitive RSVP tracking web application. This project aimed to provide a seamless experience for users to confirm their attendance, access wedding details, while also equipping administrative users with detailed insights into RSVP statuses.

Projects.name: Portfolio Website
Projects.description: A responsive personal portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and experience.
Projects.about: My personal portfolio website serves as a comprehensive showcase of my work, skills, and experience as a web developer. It features a responsive design that seamlessly adapts to various screen sizes, ensuring a consistent and engaging user experience across devices. Built using React and React Typescript—the core web technologies—the website offers an informative and captivating user journey. In line with my commitment to accessibility, I have implemented dark mode functionality, allowing users to effortlessly switch between light and dark color schemes according to their preference. This website combines responsive development techniques with inclusive design practices following WCAG guidelines.

Projects.name: Morning Donuts
Projects.description: A website design and development project for a small business.
Projects.roles: Cloud Development, Full-Stack Development, Domain Management, Hosting, UI/UX Design
Projects.about: I took the lead in developing a website for a local business seeking to elevate its online presence. In this project, I harnessed the power of React, React Router, and AWS Amplify, seamlessly integrating Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) pipelines with GitHub. The website's design strikes a balance, presenting simplicity while exuding visual allure, seamlessly fusing aesthetics with functionality. This undertaking has not only honed my capacity to seamlessly blend design elements, crafting an engaging and visually appealing digital experience, but it has also elevated my approach to writing more modular code. Through the incorporation of TypeScript prop typing, I've enhanced code maintainability, ensuring a more robust and scalable foundation for future development endeavors.

Projects.name: IdeaXcel
Projects.description: IdeaXcel is an innovative e-learning platform that provides a wide range of courses and educational resources. It offers interactive lessons, quizzes, and progress tracking features to enhance the learning experience.
Projects.about: IdeaXcel aims to revolutionize online education by providing high-quality and engaging learning content. It caters to learners of all levels and offers courses in various subjects, including technology, business, arts, and more.
